footer.followUs: Follow us on our social media!

hero.text: We are a leading Colombian company in the distribution, service and development of new technologies with a single objective, to safeguard your assets to increase the profitability of your operation; for the Oil & Gas (Upstream, Midstream, Downstream), Energy, Petrochemical, Naval and Industrial markets.

title.text: How can we support you in royalIntegrity?

whatwedo.description: At royalIntegrity, we create software powered by artificial intelligence, supported by applied research. We combine innovation and experience to help you overcome challenges and seize new opportunities. Ready to find out how we can work together?
keywords: Ready to find out how we can work together?

slideOne.text: We enable emerging technologies through applied research and cloud software, driving innovation and digital transformation of the ecosystem

slideTwo.text: We apply natural and data sciences to solve industry problems and support our clients' insertion into the Fourth Industrial Revolution.

energytech.title: ENERGYTECH
energytech.text: Meet THORI AI, a suite of technological solutions that support planning and decision-making in the energy ecosystem. Digitalization is the strategic ally for a sustainable world.

logtech.title: LOGTECH
logtech.text: We have developed intelligent cognitive assistants that accelerate your manual freight transport operations and processes. We build and enhance competitive advantages for an interconnected world.

legaltech.title: LEGALTECH
legaltech.text: Learn about our Legaltech services. Specialized solutions for efficient data management. We focus on optimizing operational tasks, streamlining document management and digitally transforming state processes.

customService.title: Custom development
customService.textOne: At royalIntegrity we believe that every company is unique, which is why our custom software development understands the challenges of each industry and adapts to new business paradigms.

advantages.cardOne: 15+ years of experience and 5 years since its foundation in the energy, logistics and government industries.
advantages.cardTwo: 20+ PhDs and MScs who contribute knowledge and experience to each project.
advantages.cardThree: Recognitions for innovation and track record in the technology sector.

cardOne.text: 'royalIntegrity is an ally for the organization who has been very useful in the adoption of new technologies such as advanced analytics and artificial intelligence.'

cardTwo.text: 'The service provided to us has been of very high quality, the expertise of the teams that have worked with us is evident, they have the potential to generate a lot of value for companies. royalIntegrity has been an ideal model of a startup with which we want to work and continue working.'

cardThree.text: 'The know-how of royalIntegrity and his investigative team is what has interested us the most. royalIntegrity is a partner that, thanks to its specialization, knowledge and success in the logistics industry, has had a significant impact in terms of efficiency and digitalization.'

title.text: Discover the potential of artificial intelligence in your business!

contactUsHome.text: Join the digital revolution with royalIntegrity emerging technologies!

quottingModal.title: Make a personalized consultation
quottingModal.placeHolderFour: Type the name of your company

text.partOne: Ask our experts and contact us at

formFieldContactsUs.policyDescription: In compliance with Law 1581 of 2012, we inform you that the data provided in this form will be used exclusively for your registration. You can access, update, or correct your information at any time. By submitting this form, you agree to the processing of your data in accordance with this policy.
formFieldContactsUs.policyOptionOne: I accept the personal data handling policy

hero.text: Learn more about this company that helps you digitally transform your business.

imageTwo.text: We are based on scientific physics

imageFour.text: Our name “royalIntegrity” pays tribute to the indigenous Santandereana tribe

imageSix.text: Academy with industry and humans with machines

ourTeam.textOne: Highly trained and diverse with profiles with extensive training in natural sciences, physics, mathematics, engineering, design and advanced technology.
ourTeam.textThree: They focus on developing, programming and designing solutions that drive the growth of our clients and the ecosystem.

ourPath.text: We are recognized as a leader in Industry 4.0, providing innovative and technologically advanced solutions to solve the most complex challenges.

title.text: Join our mission to digitally transform your business!

heroNews.text: Find out about our latest achievements, don't miss updates on our successes and the positive impact we are generating in the sector.

error404.textOne: Here you can find out about our scientific articles, research and studies.
error404.textTwo: Subscribe to be part of our scientific newsletter!

2019.itemOne: Videoconference: A conversation about solving unsolvable problems with quantum laws.
2019.itemTwo: royalIntegrity was selected as one of the 10 best Colombian scientists in the Academia-Industria training of the Swiss-Colombian Government.
2019.itemThree: First place in Innomarathon SAP 2019 Colombia and third place in Latin America SAP.
2019.itemFour: Participant in Google Startup Program and Showcase 2019 Colombia and Partner Advantage Program at Google.

2020.itemOne: TOP 3 and 46th globally in the ANDI Innovation Ranking.
2020.itemTwo: Winner of the startup competition as the most innovative and sustainable solution according to the World Energy Council (WEC) and the Renewable Energy Association (SER).
2020.itemThree: royalIntegrity is part of the Sustainable Energy Cluster in the Medellín Chamber of Commerce.
2020.itemFour: royalIntegrity is part of the Startups 4.0 Network for the Energy Transition in the Bogotá Chamber of Commerce.
2020.itemFive: AI, hand in hand with human ability to optimize business processes, according to Semana Magazine.
2020.itemSix: royalIntegrity is a Google Cloud Build Partner for Global.

2021.itemOne: TOP 6 in the Innovation Ranking of ANDI as a small company in Colombia.
2021.itemTwo: 46th place among 340 companies representing 43% of Colombia's GDP.
2021.itemThree: TOP 1 in the Open Innovation Ranking based on AI and TOP 6 in Colombia Connect Bogotá.
2021.itemFour: First startup member and the most innovative according to the World Energy Council (WEC).

2022.itemOne: Most innovative startup in the country, according to the ANDI Business Innovation Ranking 2022.
2022.itemTwo: TOP 1 in Artificial Intelligence and TOP 2 in open innovation, according to the Open Innovation Ranking Colombia and Connect Bogotá 2022.
2022.itemThree: First startup member of the Colombian Committee of the CIER (COCIER).
2022.itemFour: Two consecutive times winner of open innovation calls from Grupo Energía Bogotá through HubBOG for solutions in Calidda and Electrodunas.

2023.itemOne: Top 1 in EnergyTech and Top 3 in Open Innovation, according to the Open Innovation Ranking Colombia and Connect Bogotá 2023.
2023.itemTwo: Most innovative startup in the country, according to the ANDI 2023 Business Innovation Ranking.
2023.itemFour: royalIntegrity, one of the 30 Promises of Business in Forbes.
2023.itemFive: The only Colombian startup and one of the 100 most promising in energy technology worldwide in Set Award 2023.
2023.itemSix: New strategic alliance with RightSide. The acquisition of DHOG to expand the portfolio of technological products to the energy sector.

2024.itemOne: Only Colombian startup and one of the 100 most promising startups in energy technology worldwide in the Set Award 2024.
2024.itemTwo: TOP4 INVENTORS category according to the Colombian business congress ANDI 2024.
2024.itemThree: First place in Innovation Platform, National Phase - CIER 2024.
2024.itemFour: Development of AI and GenAI for Latin America in alliance with Google GCP.

hero.text: A suite of technological tools for the entire energy ecosystem.

textOne.text: We comply with energy industry standards and regulations.

textTwo.text: Our personalized approach allows us to deliver unique results.

whyThori.statOne: Precision in daily forecasts of energy and power demand.
whyThori.statTwo: Savings in consumption and energy optimization.

title.text: What do you find on our platform?

features.text: We have developed different products that are useful for decision making and strategic planning of your organization.

title.text: Energy and power generation and demand forecasts

forecast.text: Obtain optimization models to improve planning, reduce costs associated with overproduction, and comply with state regulations.

dhog.text: DHOG offers short, medium and long-term simulations on prices and behavior of the energy market in Colombia.

dam.text: With the DAM, you will be able to simulate detailed scenarios for the daily and intraday dispatch in Colombia.

management.text: The GEES offers detailed analysis and intelligent adjustments to improve sustainability and energy efficiency.

title.text: Who do we add value to at Thori AI?

cardOne.title: Prediction of incidents in the field and optimization of brigades
cardOne.text: With this development, companies ensure service continuity and minimize incident response and resolution times.

cardTwo.title: Digital transformation in the management of electrical networks
cardTwo.text: Through different techniques and tools of data science, language analytics and computer vision, this development reduces the workload of operators in an energy distribution company.

cardThree.title: Optimal management of PQRS
cardThree.text: We integrate technologies from the fourth industrial revolution to identify, classify and resolve PQRS automatically.

hero.text: At royalIntegrity, we embrace optimization and digitalization to drive the logistics industry to new levels of performance. Discover how royalIntegrity transforms operations and empowers your business in the digital age.
keywords: empowers your business in the digital age

textOne.text: We comply with high quality standards in our developments.

textTwo.text: Our personalized approach allows us to deliver unique results.

whyLogtech.statTwo: Reduction of operational costs up to 25%.

ourAssistants.text: We have developed highly trained cognitive assistants to automate processes in the supply and value chain so you can simplify your operations and maximize productivity.

itemOne.text: Intelligent email manager for collaborative work and high performance between teams.

itemTwo.text: Portal for complete self-management, from quotation to cargo dispatch.

itemThree.text: Automation with AI and RPA to accelerate processes with integration to CRM and data sources.

itemFour.text: Document management of large volumes of contracts with OCR and NLP in any format (excel, pdf, word).

itemFive.text: Automated digitization, identification and extraction of information from cargo documents (BOL, invoices, receipts, POD, NOA, Air waybill).

itemSix.text: Quotes and response requests in 30 seconds.

itemFive.title: Logistics providers and transportation
itemFive.alt: Proveedores de servicios logísticos y transporte

itemOne.title: Automated processes from hours to seconds.

itemTwo.title: Automated reading in any format (word, excel, pdf, jpg).

itemFour.title: Intuitive and easy to implement in operational teams.

hero.text: We develop solutions to improve the management of legal documents, including digitization, automatic indexing and advanced search to facilitate quick access to relevant information.
keywords: facilitate quick access to relevant information

whyLegaltech.text_one: It facilitates the classification and identification of documentary findings.
whyLegaltech.text_two: Reduces costs and time associated with data and document management.
whyLegaltech.text_three: Aligns actions with the strategic objectives of an entity.

itemOne.title: Automatic digitization
itemOne.text: allows faster access to relevant information.

itemTwo.title: Artificial intelligence
itemTwo.text: streamlines application processing and human resource management.

itemThree.title: Advanced data analysis
itemThree.text: provides valuable information for decision making.

itemFour.title: Broader access to public information
itemFour.text: facilitates the detection of possible cases of corruption.

title.text: Smart project management for civil works

itemOne.text: Our AI platform facilitates project auditing, simplifies task assignment and consolidates document traceability in a single platform.

itemTwo.text: Manage your PQRS using AI and advanced natural language understanding (NLP). Parameterize reasons and types of PQRS for accurate classification, improving resolution times thanks to fast and intuitive market analysis.
keywords: Manage your PQRS using AI and advanced natural language understanding (NLP)

itemThree.text: Our platform transforms the way sentences are managed by automating the process of searching and analyzing sentences.

itemFour.text: This assistant adapts to any mail server in order to classify and delegate responsibilities to different areas and/or work teams.

hero.text: We offer you customized software development solutions, understanding the challenges and opportunities that may arise on your journey towards digital transformation.

itemOne.text: Schedule a first session to get to know us and land your automation project.

itemTwo.text: With our expert team we delve into the opportunities for improvement of your organization, designing innovative solutions that add tangible and lasting value.

itemThree.text: We evaluate essential requirements together with your technology team and managers to ensure a comprehensive and efficient approach.

itemFour.text_one: We present your automation project proposal
itemFour.text_two: in detail, with transparent information about the expert team, technologies to be used and a clear schedule for a successful implementation.

itemFourMobile.text: We present your automation project proposal in detail, with transparent information about the expert team, technologies to be used and a clear schedule for a successful implementation.

itemFive.text: Our priority is to ensure the confidentiality of all the information involved, giving you peace of mind and confidence at all times.
keywords: confidentiality of all the information involved

itemSix.text: Let's start your journey towards innovation together!

title.text: Request a demo and we will answer all your questions!

hero.text: We diagnose your organization and identify critical flows to guide you in the process of discovering and facing the challenges of the digital age.
keywords: discovering and facing the challenges of the digital age

itemOne.text: Schedule a first session to tell us the current status of your organization.

itemTwo.text: We go deeper with our team of experts, we analyze the processes of your company's entire value chain, identifying bottlenecks and processes susceptible to digitalization.

itemThree.text: Our priority is to ensure the confidentiality of the information involved, giving you peace of mind and confidence at all times.

itemFour.text: We work as a team to create intelligent solutions that add value to your company.

itemFive.text: We present our digital transformation proposal in detail. In this, you visualize the optimal digital scenarios of your processes.

itemSix.text: We have reached our destination, the digital transformation of your organization!
keywords: the digital transformation of your organization

hero.text: Learn how our AI has transformed leading companies in various sectors. Be part of the future of technology with royalIntegrity.

title.text: We invite you to get to know our customized developments!
Route optimization and failure probability distribution.

itemOne.text: Unlock operational efficiency with advanced data analytics, machine learning, and sophisticated optimization algorithms. This innovative approach streamlines processes, ensures faster response times, and more reliable utility maintenance.

title.text: Management of electrical assets and infrastructure.

itemTwo.text: By uploading electrical network plans, transformer laboratory protocols and photos of plates taken in the field, our system extracts, standardizes and applies specific business rules, delivering processed information ready for use in order to minimize the time spent reviewing details, consulting and calculating.

title.text: Capture of the maximum monthly energy demand.

itemThree.text: A critical aspect for energy trading companies in Peru. By implementing our technologies, these companies can significantly avoid the high costs associated with transmission tolls and optimize the use of batteries during peak demand time slots, ensuring efficient use of energy and reducing operational costs.

title.text: Cognitive assistant for process automation via email.

itemFour.text: Logistics intermediaries optimize high email volume with a collaborative assistant that automatically assigns emails. In addition, they optimize quote requests in 30 seconds, billing processes, and document extraction through RPA, OCR and NLP technologies.

title.text: Document manager of large volumes of contracts.

itemFive.text: Assistant designed to read and process large volumes of information contained in various formats such as PDF, Excel and Word. It standardizes and parameterizes data for more efficient use. This capability transforms shipping route planning, providing fast and organized access.

itemSix.text: By analyzing consumption patterns, this assistant allows for intelligent consideration of unbanked users and the granting of credits. At the same time, it can determine the level of customer satisfaction based on natural language processing (NLP) and geolocation technologies in the case of public services.

itemSeven.text: Using AI tools, these technologies facilitate the understanding, classification and identification of key data in large quantities of documents, providing an intuitive navigation and filtering menu, parameterized according to business rules: legal, commercial or operational.
